ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] some encouragement  for a humble newb
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve run out of mana on kei.  my druid (22) is always with kei and is the healer of the group (normally).  She sits around and buffs and heals.  my mage evne
ygData.messageBody:
I've run out of mana on kei. my druid (22) is always with kei and is the healer of the group (normally). She sits around and buffs and heals. my mage evne with kei will run out of mana with about 5-6 nukes and DS's. I must say, for my druid being on kei since the beginning of her creation, her med is still almost maxed, and her combat skills are still good. amazing waht you can do after you learn the game a bit better.
Kittin
